testcase.classname: Multiple vegetable search and place order on greenKart
testcase.name: Validation of search functionality and placing multiple Vegetable order
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into greenKart home page..................................passed When User search Brinjal on search option...................................passed And Added 3 items to the cart by clicking add to cart button................passed And User clicks on ProccedToCheckOut button.................................passed Then User should navigate to order confirmation page........................passed And product name should contains Brinjal and Quantity as 3..................passed And Place order button should be enabled....................................passed

testcase.classname: Multiple vegetable search and place order on greenKart
testcase.name: Validation of search functionality and placing multiple Vegetable order 2
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into greenKart home page..................................passed When User search Beetroot on search option..................................passed And Added 5 items to the cart by clicking add to cart button................passed And User clicks on ProccedToCheckOut button.................................passed Then User should navigate to order confirmation page........................passed And product name should contains Beetroot and Quantity as 5.................passed And Place order button should be enabled....................................passed

testcase.classname: Multiple vegetable search and place order on greenKart
testcase.name: Validation of search functionality and placing multiple Vegetable order 3
testcase.system-out: Given User logged into greenKart home page..................................passed When User search Cucumber on search option..................................passed And Added 2 items to the cart by clicking add to cart button................passed And User clicks on ProccedToCheckOut button.................................passed Then User should navigate to order confirmation page........................passed And product name should contains Cucumber and Quantity as 2.................passed And Place order button should be enabled....................................passed
